channel.title: 5 on Carl Müller-Crepon
channel.description: Recent content in 5 on Carl Müller-Crepon

item.title: Nationalism and the Transformation of the State: Border Change and Conflict in Europe and Beyond
item.description: We show how nationalism, through violent conflict and border change, caused an increasing congruence between states and nations in Europe.

item.title: Bound Together: How Ethnic Groups and Modern States Shape Each Other
item.description: I study how ethnic groups and political groups shape each other under modern territorial state rule.
